tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 61st qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: 2011: Made the cut in three of four starts on the Web.com Tour. Best finish was a T10 at the Chiquita Classic thanks to a second-round 64 that moved him into contention. Has played on the Tight Lies Tour, eGolf Tour, Hooters Tour and Canadian Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Helped lead his Jenks High School team in Tulsa, OK, to four state championships...Was a two-time All-American at SMU and earned WAC Freshman of the Year and WAC Player of the Year honors....Missed the cut at the 2005 Nissan Open as an amateur.
tourBios.personal: Instructor is Steve Johnson...Favorite course he has played is Southern Hills CC and would like to play Shinnecock Hills...Never travels without the Bible...Favorite websites are twitter.com, cnbc.com and pgatour.com...Favorite college team is the Oklahoma Sooners...Favorite TV show is "Planet Earth," and he enjoys watching the Golf Channel. Favorite movies are "Top Gun," "The Thomas Crown Affair" and "Gladiator."...Favorite music group is Need to Breathe...Favorite food is chipotle...Favorite athletes to watch are Dwyane Wade, Travis Rice and Adam Scott...Favorite city to visit is Manhattan Beach, Calif., and he enjoys spending vacation time at Mammoth Mountain in California...Twitter account is @willdodson1...Dream foursome includes his dad, mom and sister...Bucket list includes heli-skiing...Supports College Golf Fellowship and The Village Church.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T10th in 2011 at the Chiquita Classic.
